body:
Lets be honest here, after he died, his faction would seek revenge. Either it would go humans rape lamia or lamia reverse rape humans. But since the author doesn't like sexual content, i guess the lamia would get burned to death after killing a human.

Can someone explain to me, the alure to this fetish? Is this just about being dominated to death with no sexual content? i really don't get it.
I dont like this at all i enjoy being held tightly but not getting crushed to death like.. Wtf
There's obviously something wrong with this one and I know y'all also know this
Umm add snuff tag in stuffs like this so we don't get baited to see something we don't wanna
Where is the hot in getting nearly beaten to death
Well, this got twisted real quick. Good thing she didn't kill him. But he ain't walking so well.
And now we reaching a level of fetishness that we shouldn't
@Tigarekusu-Ashu: I believe some people do love the feel of being beaten up to death by opposite gender.
What part of this was suposed to be hot ?
This doujin gave me the ability to speak japanese. Why spend time and money to learn when you can just read this doujin and instantly be able to speak japanese?
Cool, I can understand Japanese all of a sudden
